comments: RBG, Kew Gardener from 1879, Assistant Curator 1886-1901, Curator 1901-1922. Published Kew Notes in Gard. Chron. as 'W.W.'
source: Notice of retirement in Gard. Chron. 72: 71 (1922). Obituary in Gard. Chron., 77:102 (1925). Obit. in Kew Guild, 1926: 394, 422-425 and Kew Bull.: 94-95 (1925). Portr. in Gard. Chron., 11: 813 (1892).
